select a.*,u.name,u.name_pinyin,u.card,u.type,u.isvisible,u.email,u.phone,u.address from t_account a,t_user u where 1=1 and a.userid = u.code and a.id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select o.* from t_account2organization ao ,t_organization o ,t_account ac where ao.orgid = o.id and o.isdeleted='0' and ao.accountid =ac.id and ac.logname = #{logName}
